Package model.card

package model.card
The model.card package contains classes representing the cards used in the Jackaroo game. This package includes both standard playing cards (e.g., Ace, King, Queen) and special wild cards (e.g., Burner, Saver). The Deck class is responsible for managing the card pool, loading cards from a CSV file, shuffling the deck, and handling card drawing operations.

Key Classes:

  • Card - The abstract base class for all card types.
  • Deck - Manages the card pool and handles card drawing logic.

Standard Cards:

  • invalid reference 
    model.card.standard.Ace
  • invalid reference 
    model.card.standard.King

Wild Cards:

  • invalid reference 
    model.card.wild.Burner
  • invalid reference 
    model.card.wild.Saver

Usage:


 Deck.loadCardPool(boardManager, gameManager);
 ArrayList<Card> hand = Deck.drawCards();
The package ensures that cards are loaded dynamically from external data sources (e.g., CSV files), promoting modularity and scalability for future card additions or rule changes.
